meta.disclaimer: Do not rely on openFDA to make decisions regarding medical care. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated. We may limit or otherwise restrict your access to the API in line with our Terms of Service.

results.product_description: BDAY CAKE MOCHI CRUNCH packed in pink plastic pouch packaging, net wt. 5oz, UPC 7189147148, Orwaiian LLC, 465 NE Burnside Rd Gresham, OR 97030.    The label declares "***Ingredients: Sesame Seeds, Milk Powder, Nonfat dry milk, Soy Lecithin, Coconut ***CONTAINS: Soy, Sesame ***MANUFACTURED in a facility that also processes: MILK ***SOY, SESAME***COCONUT***".
results.reason_for_recall: Label has a Contains statement that is missing milk and coconut (tree nut) that are declared in the ingredients statement.
results.code_info: MFG Code: MCBD05. Expiry dates of 07-29-2025 or earlier.  MFG Code breakdown as Mochi Crunch B Day 5oz
